name: ReorderAssignmentRules
description:
Reorder error tracking assignment rules in a project environment.

This tool allows reordering of assignment rules for error tracking within a specific project environment. Useful for prioritizing rules in Datadog environments.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The Project ID for accessing the desired project. Retrieve it using /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: rule_id
parameters.description: The specific ID of the assignment rule to be reordered within the project environment.

parameters.name: rule_filters
parameters.description: A string containing conditions to filter assignment rules for reordering. Useful for applying specific criteria when reordering rules.

parameters.name: target_assignee
parameters.description: Specifies the assignee for the error tracking rules in the project. This should be a valid user identifier in the Datadog environment.

parameters.name: rule_order_position
parameters.description: The new position for the assignment rule in the order list. Use an integer to specify the desired position.

parameters.name: disable_rule_data
parameters.description: Specify whether rule data is disabled, using 'true' or 'false'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
